backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor defining SprintPlan/DayPlan types, plan storage with Map, and resource lookup logic per skill/level/day; applies migrations on upgrade via MixinStorage and Migration modules.
backend/migration.mo: Motoko migration module that updates existing SprintPlan records by backfilling day-level resources using a local getResourcesForDay lookup, transforming OldActor state to NewActor on canister upgrade.
feature_evidence.json: Empty feature evidence report JSON with no recorded features.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON document containing one-line summaries of all frontend source files, describing their styling, components, hooks, and pages for build planning reference.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base CSS file defining OKLCH-based CSS custom property tokens for light and dark themes covering background, foreground, card, border, chart, and sidebar colors.
frontend/index.html: Minimal HTML entry point for the SkillSprint Vite/React app, mounting the React root and loading main.tsx as a module.
frontend/src/App.tsx: TanStack Router setup with a root route wrapping Layout, a home route for SkillInputForm, and a /plan/$planId route for PlanResults.
frontend/src/components/DownloadPdfButto: Button component that opens a print window with a fully styled HTML/CSS sprint plan PDF template including day cards, metadata, resources, and common mistakes.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: App shell component with a glassmorphism sticky header featuring the SkillSprint logo and AI badge, a main content slot, and a footer with caffeine.ai attribution.
frontend/src/components/PaywallModal.tsx: Renders a paywall modal that prompts users to pay â‚¹20 via UPI and submit a transaction ID to unlock a full 7-day sprint plan, using the `useSubmitTransactionId` mutation for verification.
frontend/src/components/ProgressGraph.ts: Displays an SVG bar chart showing per-day completion progress across a 7-day sprint, with colored bars and percentage grid lines.
Interactive day-by-day progress tracker for a 7-day sprint that awards XP, tracks streaks, and unlocks badges (streak, halfway, complete) as days are marked done.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Custom hook that creates and caches an ICP backend actor (authenticated or anonymous) based on the current Internet Identity, invalidating dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides an `InternetIdentityProvider` context and `useInternetIdentity` hook for managing ICP Internet Identity authentication state, including login, logout, and identity persistence via `AuthClient`.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for creating plans, fetching plan data (full and public views), checking unlock status, and submitting UPI transaction IDs against the ICP backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Global CSS file that imports Google Fonts (Space Grotesk, Syne), sets up Tailwind layers, defines a Gen-Z vibrant OKLCH color palette via CSS variables, and provides utility classes for gradients, glows, shadows, and text effects.
frontend/src/main.tsx: React app entry point that wraps the App component with QueryClientProvider (React Query) and InternetIdentityProvider before mounting to the DOM.
frontend/src/pages/PlanResults.tsx: Plan results page that fetches and displays a generated 7-day skill sprint, rendering day cards with objectives/tasks/resources, a progress tracker, progress graph, paywall modal for locked days, and a PDF download button.
frontend/src/pages/SkillInputForm.tsx: Landing page form that lets users select a skill, set hours per day, choose a skill level, and enter a desired outcome, then submits to generate a sprint plan and navigates to the results page.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending the theme with custom OKLCH color tokens (neon palette, chart, sidebar), typography/container-queries/animate plugins, custom fonts, border radii, and box shadows.
project_state.json: Project state metadata describing SkillSprint's architecture, existing features, known issues (blank day plan content, missing study resources), and constraints such as manual UPI payment and fixed resource URL mappings.
